title: Where to Look for Your Dishwasher’s Model Number

steps.title: The model and serial numbers are found in one of three places.
steps.content: The model and serial numbers are found in one of three places. Open your GE dishwasher's door, and check these locations for the model and serial number tag: On the left wall of the dishwasher, toward the front. On the right wall of the dishwasher, toward the front. On the inside of the door's rightmost edge. [1] X Research source

steps.title: You'll find the model and serial numbers in one of two places:
steps.content: You'll find the model and serial numbers in one of two places: Inside the door. Open the door of your Frigidaire dishwasher and inspect the interior of the door—the model number and serial number will usually be printed on a sticker on the door's inner rim. On the right side of the dishwasher tub. If you don't see the model and serial number sticker on the door, inspect the right side of the dishwasher tub for the sticker.

steps.title: Find the model number inside the dishwasher, on the rim.
steps.content: Find the model number inside the dishwasher, on the rim. Just open the door of your Whirlpool dishwasher and look for a silver or white sticker on the right or left wall close to the door. The sticker displays both the model and serial number of your Whirlpool dishwasher. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Your Bosch dishwasher's model number is inside the door.
steps.content: Your Bosch dishwasher's model number is inside the door. Open the dishwasher door and look at its outer rim for a white sticker. Depending on the Bosch dishwasher model, the sticker is either on the top of the rim or the right side. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Your model number tag is inside the dishwasher door.
steps.content: Your model number tag is inside the dishwasher door. Once you open the door, you'll find both the model and serial number of your LG dishwasher printed on a sticker on the door's right side. [4] X Research source

steps.title: The model and serial number plate is inside the dishwasher's door.
steps.content: The model and serial number plate is inside the dishwasher's door. Open the door and locate the sticker on the right side of its rim. The Miele dishwasher model number is printed next to "Mod," and the serial number is labeled "SN."

steps.title: The model number is on the front of your Maytag dishwasher.
steps.content: The model number is on the front of your Maytag dishwasher. With your dishwasher door closed, look for a sticker adhered to the upper-left corner of the door. If you don't see one, it'll be below the control panel, closer to the right side of the door. [5] X Research source

steps.title: The model number is inside your dishwasher.
steps.content: The model number is inside your dishwasher. Open your Samsung dishwasher's door, and look for a sticker containing the model and serial number in these three locations: On the top of the door's inner rim. On the right or left side of the door's rim. On the inside edge of the dishwasher's tub—either the right or left side. [6] X Research source

steps.title: The model number is on a sticker inside your dishwasher's door.
steps.content: The model number is on a sticker inside your dishwasher's door. Open your KitchenAid dishwasher's door and inspect the right side of the rim. You'll find both the model and serial number here. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Your dishwasher's model number is printed inside the door.
steps.content: Your dishwasher's model number is printed inside the door. Open the door and check the following locations for a sticker containing the model and serial numbers: On the top of the door's inner rim. On the right or left side of the door's rim. Inside the dishwasher's tub on the right or left side, toward the front of the appliance.

steps.title: Your Electrolux dishwasher's model number is inside of its door.
steps.content: Your Electrolux dishwasher's model number is inside of its door. Open the door and look for a sticker containing the model and serial number on the inner right side. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Your Amana dishwasher's model number is inside the tub.
steps.content: Your Amana dishwasher's model number is inside the tub. Open the dishwasher door and locate the model and serial number plate on the left wall, close to the top of the appliance. [9] X Research source

steps.title: You'll find the model number below the top drawer of your DishDrawer.
steps.content: You'll find the model number below the top drawer of your DishDrawer. Pull open the top drawer of your Fisher & Paykel DishDrawer, and find the sticker just beneath the drawer's bottom-left corner. The sticker is only visible when the top drawer is pulled out. [10] X Research source
